meanings.sent1: The unapt shoes were too big for the little girl.
meanings.sent2: The unapt candidate did not have the necessary skills for the job.
meanings.sent3: It was unapt for the penguin to try flying with its wings.
meanings.sent4: The unapt puzzle piece refused to fit into the wrong spot.
meanings.sent5: The unapt umbrella leaked water all over during the storm.

meanings.sent1: The unapt student rarely raised his hand in class.
meanings.sent2: She felt unapt to join the adventurous group on the hike.
meanings.sent3: The unapt cat showed no interest in chasing the mouse toy.
meanings.sent4: His unapt mood cast a shadow over the cheerful party.
meanings.sent5: The unapt plant struggled to grow in the dark corner of the room.
